mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(NICKNAME, MEMBERID, MEMBERPW, EMAIL, PHONENUM) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{memberID}, #{memberPW}, #{email}, #{phoneNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBERPW=#{memberPW}, EMAIL=#{email}, PHONENUM=#{phoneNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBERID
